member.name: T:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.AuthController
member.summary: Authentication controller for user registration, login, token refresh, and logout operations

member.name: M:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Register(SimplyTrack.Api.Models.DTOs.RegisterRequestDto)
member.summary: Register a new user account
member.param: User registration details
member.returns: Authentication response with access and refresh tokens
member.response: Invalid input or user already exists

member.name: M:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Login(SimplyTrack.Api.Models.DTOs.LoginRequestDto)
member.summary: Authenticate user and obtain access and refresh tokens
member.param: User login credentials
member.returns: Authentication response with access and refresh tokens

member.name: M:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.AuthController.RefreshToken(SimplyTrack.Api.Models.DTOs.RefreshTokenRequestDto)
member.summary: Refresh access token using a valid refresh token
member.param: Refresh token request containing the current refresh token

member.name: M:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.AuthController.Logout(SimplyTrack.Api.Models.DTOs.RefreshTokenRequestDto)
member.summary: Logout user and revoke refresh tokens
member.param: Optional refresh token to revoke specifically
member.response: Unauthorized - invalid or missing access token

member.name: T:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.DashboardController
member.summary: Dashboard controller providing overview data for the fitness tracking application

member.name: M:SimplyTrack.Api.Controllers.DashboardController.GetDashboardExercises(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get dashboard overview of user's exercises with recent session data
member.param: Maximum number of exercises to return (default: 100)
member.returns: List of exercises with dashboard summary information
member.response: Unauthorized - invalid or missing access token

member.summary: Get all exercises for the current user with optional search and session data

Include information about the last workout session
member.response: Unauthorized - invalid or missing access token

member.summary: Create a new exercise for the current user
member.param: Exercise creation data

member.summary: Get detailed information about a specific exercise
member.param: The unique identifier of the exercise
member.response: Unauthorized - invalid or missing access token
Exercise not found or doesn't belong to current user

member.summary: Update an existing exercise

Exercise update data

Exercise not found or doesn't belong to current user

member.summary: Delete an exercise and all its associated workout sessions
member.param: The unique identifier of the exercise to delete
member.response: Unauthorized - invalid or missing access token
Exercise not found or doesn't belong to current user

member.summary: Get workout history for a specific exercise
member.param: The unique identifier of the exercise
Maximum number of sessions to return (default: 100)
Number of sessions to skip for pagination (default: 0)
member.returns: List of workout sessions for the exercise
